channel.title: Can someone make a server via Teamviewer? (I tried so much times but failed)
channel.description:
I failed many, many times trying to make a private server. And I give it up, it never works! I mean, one time it did with hamachi, but I need a better server + client. Maybe someone can make a server for me?
The editing of the server I will do myself like the gamename and stuff. The only thing I want you to do is downloading a working source and client and then make it so it connects to my no-ip connection.
Please, this is not because I am lazy, but I just don't want to try it again and again because I fail everytime.
The guy who will help me may get admin ranked on the server, if he wants. Or else just honor from me. xD

item.title: Can someone make a server via Teamviewer? (I tried so much times but failed)

item.description:
@wodskill4eva wrote:

Well PM me Ill Help you
Calle11@live.se
Portforwarding Not needed if i help OFC
